Igor Ranitovic writes:
> Currently we don't have indexing tool within the Heritrix project.
> This is definitely part of the future work.
[...]
> The tools that we have that chew on arcs files are not open
> source. At this point we can provide these tools to other nonprofit
> or library like organizations.  We are working on getting these
> tools publicly available. If that does not work out we are planning
> on providing open source alternatives.

I have been hit by this lack of tools for maintaining and working with
ARC files, and to that end I have been developing a library in C++
(which I am more comfortable with than Java) to provide access to the
elements of a (set of) ARC file(s) so you can extract, index, iterate,
or whatever.

Indications are that my company will allow me to open source this
library and associated tools. One of the modules will be an interface
to MySQL so I can use it for the index.

    -tree
